parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To wage war, fight, serve as a soldier; fig: of the warring lusts against the soul.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To enfold, entangle; pass: To be involved in. From en and pleko; to entwine, i.e. involve with.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A primary word; life, i.e. the present state of existence; by implication, the means of livelihood.
A business, an occupation, affair, transaction. From pragmateuomai; a transaction, i.e. Negotiation.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To please, with the idea of willing service rendered to others; hence almost: I serve. Probably from airo; to be agreeable.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: To collect an army, enlist troops. From a compound of the base of stratia and lego; to gather as a warrior, i.e. Enlist in the army.
